int Rating [get, set]
 As a work-around (ID3v2 does not denote a field to save something like a rating), we save our rating in the "DiscCount" field, as it is un-used by most other players (and you will not want any other player after having tried Crossfade ;-)).

Detailed Description

Handles ID3v2 reading / writing using TagLib-Sharp.
